alert.note: Alert for Tallahatchie (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 4:29PM CDT until October 12 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Tallahatchie County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Parchman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Webb, Sumner, Paynes, Glendora, Distall, Leverett, Whitehead, Swan Lake, Albin, Mikoma, Tippo and Effie. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
